tweet.text: To peace! Officials shake hands and toast with champagne @VillaMajestic to recognize the ceasefire in #Vietnam on 27 Jan #1973: https://t.co/4rzLNFi9FD #twitterstorians #FRUS https://t.co/S8TS0Gqi7i
tweet.html: To peace! Officials shake hands and toast with champagne @VILLAMAJESTIC to recognize the ceasefire in #Vietnam on 27 Jan #1973: go.usa.gov/xnvuX #twitterstorians #FRUS
